meanings.definition: The quality or state of being flagitious.
meanings.sent1: Her flagitiousnesses were evident in her cruel actions towards others.
meanings.sent2: The flagitiousnesses of the criminal shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent3: Despite his flagitiousnesses, he somehow managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The flagitiousnesses of the situation left a dark cloud hanging over the town.
meanings.sent5: The flagitiousnesses of the crime scene were etched into his memory forever.

meanings.definition: The act of being extremely wicked or criminal.
meanings.sent1: The flagitiousnesses of the villain knew no bounds.
meanings.sent2: His flagitiousnesses caught up with him when he was finally caught by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The flagitiousnesses of the cat stealing treats from the dog were both hilarious and naughty.
meanings.sent4: The flagitiousnesses of the storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The flagitiousnesses of the dictator's regime were felt by all who dared to oppose him.
